original_text: If you want to put a widow's name on the list of widows, this is what she must be like. She must be more than 60 years old. She must have been the wife of one husband.
korean_text: 과부로 명부에 올릴 자는 나이가 육십이 덜 되지 아니하고 한 남편의 아내였던 자로서

sentences.original_text: If you want to put a widow's name
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 당신이 과부의 이름을 올리고 싶다면

sentences.original_text: this is what she must be like
She must be more than 60 years old
She must have been the wife of one husband
